post.title: 测试高亮代码
post.content:
*
LAYOUT: Two columns
DESCRIPTION: Two-column fixed layout with one sidebar right of content
*/

#container {
	float: left;
	margin: 0 -240px 0 0;
	width: 100%;
}
#content {
	margin: 0 280px 0 20px;
}
#primary,
#secondary {
	float: right;
	overflow: hidden;
	width: 220px;
}
#secondary {
	clear: right;
}
#footer {
	clear: both;
	width: 100%;
}
